name: Space Gladiator - First wave alpha
description:
Space Gladiator is a top-down 2d wave shooter. Mow down tons of aliens as they try to destroy you. Collect powerups to improve your weapons strenght, combo to make the crowd go wild and see how many points you can get before the aliens get you.

This game is in very early development. Any critique and suggestion is welcome, and will be taken into consideration.

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Special

Space - Dash
